author: user
content: from qiskit import QuantumCircuit, transpile from qiskit_aer import AerSimulator from qiskit.visualization import plot_histogram qc QuantumCircuit 5, 5 qc.h range 5 for i in range 5 : qc.x i qc.measure range 5 , range 5 simulator AerSimulator qc_transpiled transpile qc, simulator result simulator.run qc_transpiled, shots 1024 .result counts result.get_counts print "Simulation Results 1024 shots :", counts plot_histogram counts ------------- 크로스라이트가 이렇게 써줬는데 이거 보기만해도 결과가 시뮬레이션으로 예측이되니 ?
